alert.note: Alert for Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:27PM EDT until June 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR CATOOSA...GILMER...MURRAY...WHITFIELD...NORTHWESTERN DAWSON... NORTHERN GORDON...NORTHERN PICKENS AND SOUTHERN FANNIN COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stover Creek Shelter to Carters to near Tunnel Hill, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Jasper, Ringgold, Ellijay, Fort Oglethorpe, Varnell, Eton, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, East Ellijay, Resaca, Talking Rock, Fairmount, Ranger, Amicalola Falls State Park, Crandall, Fausett Lake and Beaverdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
